pullrequest.title: Grant permission to optional Admin Identity upon metric creation.

content.raw:
Thanks for the review @preyna , I have addressed the comments you left.
Changes include: Not storing the `admin_identity` in the database, moving this extra permission grant into the first permission grant's callback and include two test cases: After creating the identity of TeamC and grant permission to TeamA over it, I make sure that TeamA has access to it and can modify it.
content.html: Thanks for the review @preyna , I have addressed the comments you left. Changes include: Not storing the admin_identity in the database, moving this extra permission grant into the first permission grant's callback and include two test cases: After creating the identity of TeamC and grant permission to TeamA over it, I make sure that TeamA has access to it and can modify it.
